C3 Interface¶

class epyk.interfaces.graphs.CompChartsC3.C3(context)¶
area(record, y_columns=None, x_axis=None, profile=None, width=100, '%', height=330, 'px', options=None, htmlCode=None)¶

Display a area line chart from C3

Related Pages:

https://c3js.org/samples/chart_step.html

Parameters

  • record – List of dict. The Python recordset

  • y_columns – List. The columns corresponding to keys in the dictionaries in the record

  • x_axis – String. The column corresponding to a key in the dictionaries in the recor

  • profile –

  • width – Tuple. The width of the component in the page, default (100, ‘%’)

  • height – Tuple. The height of the component in the page, default (330, “px”)

  • options –

  • htmlCode –
